author: Bob Koski, ABECS (AW) (Ret.)
content: So many deaths demand nothing less. Courts Martial of these officers is the only appropriate way to resolve this.

author: D. Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner
content:
Hmm – perhaps one of these would be enough !! Some glitch must have happened.

Good Watch

author: D. Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner
content:
One suggests you read up on international maritime law. Seafarers take responsibility for both their direct actions and the being in command whether on direct duty or not. Would that governments and others did the same.

Good Watch.
